title.narrative: FILLING THEMATIC GAPS

description.narrative: By the end of 2019, mechanisms to monitor public investment in children exist at all three levels of government and actions have been implemented to improve distribution across all groups of child rights., which contributes to Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Public Finance And Local Governance, Social Protection. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2019, monitoring mechanisms for child rights are created and functioning with the production of high quality disaggregated data and through the analysis of policies and programmes related to children.

sector.narrative: Child poverty analysis towards policy change (Profiling, mapping and identifying drivers of multi-dimensional and monetary poverty of children, modelling and simulation of policy options)
Public finance management in social protection

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By the end of 2019, mechanisms to monitor public investment in children exist at all three levels of government and actions havebeen implemented to improve distribution across all groups of child rights.

description.narrative: In 2019, UNICEF worked to strengthen data collection and improved capacities at the subnational level, mainly with the Government of Mexico City, by supporting the implementation of the Mi Beca para Empezar cash transfer. | Status:Met | As-of Date:23/01/2020

title.narrative: Ni?os, ni?as y adolescentes en mayor vulnerabilidad tienen cobertura de sistemas de proteccion social.(63513)

baseline.value: 45.51% de los ni?os, ni?as y adolescentes en pobreza multidimensional no tienen acceso a programas federales de proteccion social.

title.narrative: Porcentaje del gasto social en el presupuesto federal asignado a programas focalizados en los ni?os, ni?as y adolescentes en situacion de pobreza extrema, (multidimensional).(63510)

baseline.value: 6% del gasto federal se focaliza explicitamente en los ni?os, ni?as y adolescentes en pobreza extrema.

title.narrative: Numero de programas en el Presupuesto de Egresos de la Federacion vinculado con los derechos a la proteccion y a la participacion.(27510)

baseline.value: En el derecho a la participacion y el derecho a la proteccion 0 y 4 programas presupuestarios forman parte, respectivamente, del PEF 2012

target.value: 2019:En el derecho a la participacion y el derecho a la proteccion 2 y 8 programas presupuestarios forman parte, respectivamente, del PEF 2019.

actual.value: 2020:6 programas vinculados con el derecho a la Participacion y 7 vinculados al derecho a la Proteccion
